author: JTR_11
title: ok from what i can remember
review: i got this years ago from a kellogs exibition thing, i was only young so i cant remember much about it. its a good little bike, easy to build and the suspension works well. would have been better if you got a person to sit on it but otherwise, nice bike.

author: zniesmaczony
title: So is it a System or Technic?
review: It's hard for me to review such a small set because what's there to review? Just another micro scale technic motorcycle. with rubber band suspension, the same as in models 1259, 2544. So that's about it. What got me surprised though is that when I bought the model on Bricklink and it came to me, I found out that the picture on the box is different than the one shown here and it has a Technic logo, instead of System which kinda made me happy because I collect a TECHNIC motorcycles and this one was kind of Technic, since it has the label System. And suddenly such a shock. Oh well. Another addition to my collection I suppose.
